A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Looooooooooved the movie! 

I loved how Luke died with purpose just like Obi and Yoda did. Loved how Kylo shows us that he can not be controlled and has the ability to be more powerful than Snoke. 

I also love that this felt like it was more about Luke then it was about Rey. This movie was amazing closure for Luke's character. 
5/5
